00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <midas.h>

00026 /*---- Windows NT section ------------------------------------------*/
00027 
00028 #ifdef OS_WINNT

00030 int __stdcall CM_CONNECT_EXPERIMENT(char *fhost, int lhost,
00031                                     char *fexp, int lexp, char *fname, int lname)
00032 {
00033    char host[256], exp[256], name[256];
00034 
00035    strncpy(host, fhost, lhost);
00036    host[lhost] = 0;
00037 
00038    strncpy(exp, fexp, lexp);
00039    exp[lexp] = 0;
00040 
00041    strncpy(name, fname, lname);
00042    name[lname] = 0;
00043 
00044    return cm_connect_experiment(host, exp, name, NULL);
00045 }
00046 
00047 int __stdcall CM_DISCONNECT_EXPERIMENT()
00048 {
00049    return cm_disconnect_experiment();
00050 }
00051 
00052 int __stdcall BM_OPEN_BUFFER(char *fname, int lname, int *buffer_size, int *buffer_handle)
00053 {
00054    char name[256];
00055 
00056    strncpy(name, fname, lname);
00057    name[lname] = 0;
00058 
00059    return bm_open_buffer(name, *buffer_size, buffer_handle);
00060 }
00061 
00062 extern void __stdcall PROCESS_EVENT();
00063 
00064 void _process_event(HNDLE hBuf, HNDLE hRequest, EVENT_HEADER * pevent, void *pdata)
00065 {
00066    PROCESS_EVENT(&hBuf, &hRequest, pevent, pdata);
00067 }
00068 
00069 int __stdcall BM_REQUEST_EVENT(int *buffer_handle, int *event_id,
00070                                int *trigger_mask, int *sampling_type, int *request_id)
00071 {
00072    return bm_request_event(*buffer_handle,
00073                            (short int) *event_id,
00074                            (short int) *trigger_mask,
00075                            *sampling_type, request_id, _process_event);
00076 }
00077 
00078 int __stdcall CM_YIELD(int *millisec)
00079 {
00080    return cm_yield(*millisec);
00081 }

00083 #endif
